name: Ferrothorn
description: This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across rocks, and then uses the tips of its feelers to absorb the nutrients it finds within the stone.

attacks.name: Triple Smash
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Energy Slap
attacks.effect: You may move all Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
